indications:
Indications treatment of oestrogen-receptor-positive metastatic or locally advanced
breast cancer in postmenopausal women in whom disease progresses or
relapses while on, or after, other anti-oestrogen therapy
name: FULVESTRANT
breadcrumbs: 8.3 Sex hormones and hormone antagonists in malignant disease
doses:
By deep intramuscular injection into buttock,
500 mg every 2 weeks for the first 3 doses, then 500 mg every month

500 mg dose should be administered as one
250-mg injection (slowly over 1–2 minutes) into each buttock
pregnancy:
Pregnancy manufacturer advises avoid—increased incidence of
fetal abnormalities and death in animal studies
